segments.text: Hello , Mr . Gao . We appreciate your letting us have the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . You're a sweet couple . Do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The ad said rent was thirty thousand . That includes utilities and phone , I assume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it doesn't . And there's a maintenance fee for each month . It's forty NT per ping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's another one thousand six hundred ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but that doesn't include cable . It's for cleaning and trash removal . You just leave your trash outside your door .
segments.speaker: S2
